name: Wild West VR
description: Wild West VR is a first-person shooter unfolding in a western setting. Two gamepads are used as weapons. The interface is maximum smooth. Game features have been enhanced with the introduction of the waves of attacks of various levels of difficulty.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 SP1 (64bit) Processor: Intel Core i5- 4590 Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 500 MB available space
